name: conventionallogs
description: A project designed to generate changelogs while following Conventional Commit Specifications to make version release and documentation easier.

scripts.installGithook: cp scripts/commit-msg.sh .git/hooks/ && mv .git/hooks/commit-msg.sh .git/hooks/commit-msg && chmod +x .git/hooks/commit-msg && echo 'Commit message githook should be copied into local git folder'

author: Ethan Jones
